name: Grape Quest (Alpha)
description:
Welcome to Grape Quest

You are an adventurer and you here rumors that somewhere on a remote island there lies a legendary grape. This is a big opportunity for you!

Controls:

Move with WASD or arrow keys

Look around using the mouse 

Attack with left click

Dash with space bar and one of the move keys 

Pause with tab

Switch item with mouse scroll wheel

 

Other Stuff:

This is just a 2d adventure game I'm working on. I just released this prototype because I want to see if people like it or not. This is my first big project and I am fairly new to Unity so don't expect this to be the greatest game ever. I made all the sprites myself (I'm sure you can tell). Here is the music I used

MUSIC:
